âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Render animated GIFs as colorful ASCII art directly in the terminal
ðŸ“– Summary: Brrtfetch is an animated system information fetcher written in Go that renders user-specified GIFs as colorful, animated ASCII art directly in the terminal. It integrates seamlessly with existing fetchers like fastfetch or neofetch, replacing their static ASCII art with dynamic animations while displaying system information alongside. Its primary goal is to enhance the visual output of sysinfo tools with dynamic, customizable terminal art.
